best_match.title: The Last Samurai - Kagura no Netori (Tokyo Gakuso) [Soundtrack Score HD]

match_score.reasoning: Candidate 2 is the best match because its title directly names the soundtrack 'Kagura no Netori' and explicitly states it's from 'The Last Samurai' soundtrack. The description further confirms this by listing 'Kagura no Netori (Tokyo Gakuso)' as track 4 in the 'The Last Samurai (2003) Recording Sessions Soundtrack' tracklist. The channel 'thelastsamuraiost' is dedicated to the movie's soundtrack, reinforcing the authenticity and relevance of the content. While Candidate 1 also mentions the track, Candidate 2's title is more direct in presenting 'Kagura no Netori' as the primary subject of the video. Candidate 15 contains the track but is a full soundtrack upload, not a dedicated video for this specific track.
key_factors: Video title directly matches 'Kagura no Netori' and 'The Last Samurai'.
Description explicitly confirms the track is from 'The Last Samurai (2003) Recording Sessions Soundtrack' and includes it in a detailed tracklist.
The channel name 'thelastsamuraiost' indicates a dedicated focus on the movie's soundtrack.
The video duration (1m20s) is appropriate for a single soundtrack track.
The title includes '[Soundtrack Score HD]' suggesting high quality.
